function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceived susceptibility and perceived severity of contagious diseases","Impact":"Inaccurate perception can lead to risky behavior and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns on the severity and susceptibility to contagious diseases","Technologies":"Digital platforms for disseminating information and conducting virtual awareness programs","People":"General public, individuals at risk of contagious diseases","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
